critique: The document is an approval of a Code of Fair Competition for the Hosiery Industry. The tone is formal and legalistic. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is a sense of confidence and stability in the economy. There is a sense of joy that the code has been approved and that the industry will be regulated. There is no indication of sadness, anger, fear, or disgust. There is a slight sense of surprise that the code has been approved so quickly.
